title: Amazing Stories Volume 08 Number 12
creator: Sloane, Thomas O'Conor, 1851-1940
Schoepflin, Harold Vincent, 1893-1968
Smith, Edward Elmer, 1890-1965
Weiss, George Henry, 1898-1946
Walsh, James Morgan, 1897-1952
Poe, Edgar Allan, 1809-1849
description: Amazing Stories, volume 8, number 12 (April 1934). Scanned copy of a pulp magazine published by Teck Publications, Inc. and edited by Thomas O'Conor Sloane, Ph.D. Periodical copyright not renewed. Individual contributions' copyrights not renewed. This magazine and its contents are now in the public domain. Missing back cover. Featuring: Cat's Eye (Harl Vincent), Triplanetary (Edward E. Smith; 4/4), The Mentanicals (Francis Flagg), Terror Out of Space (J. M. Walsh; 3/4), and The Gold-Bug (Edgar Allan Poe).
